name: Alien Infiltration
description:
Description: Sneak across a human spaceship as an alien. Crawl through the vents, jump across the light fixtures, use your silenced pistol to take out the crew. 

Controls:

W- Jump 

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right Mouse - Read sign

Shift - Crouch

Team Members:

-PJ Wallace               -Will Ledbetter

-Michael Ranaldi   -Jackson Ashby
